scripts.build: export NODE_PRESERVE_SYMLINKS_MAIN=1 && export VUE_APP_BUILD_CORDOVA= && vue-cli-service build --mode=production
scripts.build-cordova: export NODE_PRESERVE_SYMLINKS_MAIN=1 && export VUE_APP_BUILD_CORDOVA=1 && vue-cli-service build --mode=production
scripts.build-cordova-devel: export NODE_PRESERVE_SYMLINKS_MAIN=1 && export VUE_APP_BUILD_CORDOVA=1 && vue-cli-service build --mode=development
